section.title: Starting Cactus tests
section.p: The Cactus tests are started using a JUnit Test Runner. There are several configurations for executing these test runners:

ul.li: From Ant, by using the <cactifywar> and <cactus> custom Ant tasks.
From the java command line, calling the main() method of a JUnit Test Runner.
From an IDE or any tool providing a JUnit integration plugin.
From a browser, by using the Cactus Servlet Test Runner, which is a special JUnit Test Runner.
